title: XBMC for Windows [How to make it work]
description:
Step by step guide by THK
-------------------------

1) Install: SDLdotnet-6.0.0-Runtime-Setup.exe 

	[ From: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=52340 ]

2) Download latest XBMC Release (Tested with: XBMC-SVN_2008-03-09_rev11970-T3CH.rar)

	[ From: http://T3CH.yi.se ]

3) Unpack XBMC to some nice place (ex. C:\Program\XBMC)

4) Unpack these files to XBMC root.


* glew32.dll - comes from glew-1.5.0-win32.zip

* XBMC_PC.exe - comes from XBMC-w32glfix.rar (08-02-06)

* XBMC.bat - is a batfile that fixes so that XBMC_PC can start



Now XBMC will run under Windows
